mapper.select: SELECT REST_NO FROM RESTAURANT WHERE REST_NAME = #{rest_name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESTAURANT (REST_NO, REST_NAME, REST_ADR, REST_PHONE, REST_BH, REST_INFO, REST_LOC, REST_CATE, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE) VALUES ( SEQ_REST.NEXTVAL, #{rest_name}, #{rest_adr}, #{rest_phone}, #{rest_bh}, #{rest_info}, #{rest_loc}, #{rest_cate}, #{latitude}, #{longitude} )
INSERT INTO rest_img (REST_NO, REST_IMG_NO, REST_IMG_NAME) VALUES (#{rest_no}, #{img_no}, NULL)
INSERT INTO menu (rest_no, menu_name, menu_price) VALUES (#{rest_no}, #{menu_name}, #{menu_price})
mapper.select: WITH first_image AS ( SELECT REST_NO, REST_IMG_NAME, REST_IMG_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY REST_NO ORDER BY REST_IMG_NO) AS rn FROM REST_IMG ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.REST_NO, r.REST_NAME, i.REST_IMG_NAME, i.REST_IMG_NO, DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE AS rand_val FROM RESTAURANT r LEFT JOIN first_image i ON r.REST_NO = i.REST_NO AND i.rn = 1 ORDER BY rand_val ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 300

SELECT r.REST_NO, r.REST_NAME, r.REST_PHONE, r.REST_ADR, r.REST_BH, r.REST_LOC, r.REST_CATE, r.LATITUDE, r.LONGITUDE, i.REST_IMG_NAME, i.REST_IMG_NO FROM RESTAURANT r LEFT JOIN REST_IMG i ON r.REST_NO = i.REST_NO WHERE r.REST_NO = #{rest_no}
SELECT MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE FROM MENU WHERE REST_NO = #{rest_no}

mapper.select: SELECT RES_TIME FROM RESERVE WHERE REST_NO = #{rest_no, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND RES_DATE = TO_DATE(#{res_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT e.MEM_NO, e.RES_DATE, e.RES_TIME, e.RES_MEMO, e.RES_PERSONNEL, r.REST_NO, r.REST_NAME FROM RESTAURANT r INNER JOIN RESERVE e ON r.REST_NO = e.REST_NO WHERE e.MEM_NO = #{mem_no} AND e.RES_DATE > SYSDATE-1 ORDER BY e.RES_DATE ASC, e.RES_TIME ASC

SELECT e.RES_NO, e.MEM_NO, e.RES_DATE, e.RES_TIME, e.RES_MEMO, e.RES_PERSONNEL, r.REST_NO, r.REST_NAME, r.REST_ADR, r.REST_BH, r.REST_CATE, i.REST_IMG_NAME, b.IS_PUBLIC FROM RESTAURANT r INNER JOIN RESERVE e ON r.REST_NO = e.REST_NO LEFT JOIN REST_IMG i ON r.REST_NO = i.REST_NO AND i.REST_IMG_NO=1 LEFT JOIN BOOKMARK b ON e.MEM_NO = b.MEM_NO AND r.REST_NO = b.REST_NO WHERE e.MEM_NO = #{mem_no} ORDER BY e.RES_DATE DESC, e.RES_TIME DESC, CASE WHEN b.IS_PUBLIC = 'Y' THEN 1 WHEN b.IS_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END

SELECT r.REST_NO, r.REST_NAME, r.REST_PHONE, r.REST_ADR, r.REST_BH, r.REST_LOC, r.REST_CATE, r.latitude, r.longitude, i.REST_IMG_NAME, i.REST_IMG_NO FROM RESTAURANT r LEFT JOIN ( SELECT REST_NO, REST_IMG_NAME, REST_IMG_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY REST_NO ORDER BY REST_IMG_NO) AS rn FROM REST_IMG ) i ON r.REST_NO = i.REST_NO AND i.rn = 1

SELECT r.REST_NO, r.REST_NAME, r.REST_PHONE, r.REST_ADR, r.REST_BH, r.REST_LOC, r.REST_CATE, r.LATITUDE, r.LONGITUDE, i.REST_IMG_NAME, i.REST_IMG_NO FROM RESTAURANT r LEFT JOIN REST_IMG i ON r.REST_NO = i.REST_NO WHERE i.REST_IMG_NO = 1
